title: patcher launcher issue
body:
haven't played the games for awhile and when I decided to comeback
  
http://i.imgur.com/KhC4i8R.png

 this launcher stop at around 15% then its exit by 

itself tried running it as administrator and restarting the pc but none worked , Need Help please!         {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
The patcher getting stuck around 15% could be a sign of a permissions issue, and running as Administrator is a solid workaround.  For your specific issue, though, the screen disappearing could be due to a corrupt patcher.  I recommend going over our[ Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  

Keep in mind that it may take a few moments for the patcher to scan and update your files since you haven't played in a while.  I hope that helps, and welcome back!
don't mind waiting as long its load fine currently checking the notes wish I find the solution :)

tried Resetting "winsock" again also Deleted the folder:

<C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher .but didnt seem to work 

not to mention tried reforcing a repatch also nothing changed.

would like to repair the files manually since I can't even get to open the launcher to do it if possible please instruct me on how to do that if it's 

possible or even afer  install the game all over again nothing changed ;(
